verses.verse: "You shall make<WH6213> an altar<WH4196> to burn<WH4729> incense<WH7004> on.<WH6213> You shall make it of acacia<WH7848> wood.<WH6086>

Its length<WH753> shall be a cubit,<WH520> and its breadth<WH7341> a cubit.<WH520> It shall be square,<WH7251> and its height<WH6967> shall be two cubits.<WH520> Its horns shall be of one piece with it.<WH7161>

You shall overlay<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> its top,<WH1406> its sides<WH7023> around<WH5439> it,<WH7161> and its horns; and you shall make<WH6213> a gold<WH2091> molding<WH2213> around it.<WH5439>

You shall make<WH6213> two<WH8147> golden<WH2091> rings<WH2885> for it under its molding;<WH2213> on its two<WH8147> ribs,<WH6654> on its two<WH8147> sides<WH6654> you shall make<WH6213> them;<WH1004> and they shall be for places for poles<WH905> with<WH1992> which to bear it.<WH5375>
You shall make<WH6213> the poles<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood,<WH6086> and overlay<WH6823> them with gold.<WH2091>

You shall put<WH5414> it before<WH6440> the veil<WH6532> that is by the ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715> before<WH6440> the mercy seat<WH3727> that is over the testimony,<WH5715> where I will meet with you.<WH3259>
Aaron<WH175> shall burn<WH6999> incense<WH7004> of sweet<WH5561> spices on it every morning.<WH1242> When he tends<WH3190> the lamps,<WH5216> he shall burn it.<WH6999>
When Aaron<WH175> lights<WH5927> the lamps<WH5216> at evening,<WH6153> he shall burn<WH6999> it,<WH8548> a perpetual incense<WH6999> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> throughout your generations.<WH1755>
You shall offer<WH5927> no strange<WH2114> incense<WH7004> on it,<WH5930> nor burnt offering, nor meal offering;<WH4503> and you shall pour<WH5258> no drink offering on it.<WH5262>

Aaron<WH175> shall make atonement<WH3722> on its horns<WH7161> once<WH259> in the year;<WH8141> with the blood<WH1818> of the sin offering<WH2403> of atonement<WH3725> once<WH259> in the year<WH8141> he shall make atonement<WH3722> for it throughout your generations.<WH1755> It is most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> to Yahweh.<WH3068>"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"When you take<WH5375> a census<WH7218> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> according to those who are numbered<WH6485> among them,<WH376> then each man shall give<WH5414> a ransom<WH3724> for his soul<WH5315> to Yahweh,<WH3068> when you number<WH6485> them;<WH5063> that there be no plague among them when you number them.<WH6485>

They shall give<WH5414> this,<WH5674> everyone who passes over<WH5921> to those who are numbered,<WH6485> half<WH4276> a shekel<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary;<WH6944> (the shekel<WH8255> is twenty<WH6242> gerahs;<WH1626>) half<WH4276> a shekel<WH8255> for an offering<WH8641> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
Everyone who passes<WH5674> over to those who are numbered,<WH6485> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH5414> shall give the offering<WH8641> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

The rich<WH6223> shall not give more,<WH7235> and the poor<WH1800> shall not give less,<WH4591> than the half<WH4276> shekel,<WH8255> when they give<WH5414> the offering<WH8641> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to make atonement<WH3722> for your souls.<WH5315>

You shall take<WH3947> the atonement<WH3725> money<WH3701> from the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and shall appoint<WH5414> it for the service<WH5656> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting;<WH4150> that it may be a memorial<WH2146> for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> to make atonement<WH3722> for your souls.<WH5315>"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"You shall also make<WH6213> a basin<WH3595> of brass,<WH5178> and its base<WH3653> of brass,<WH5178> in which to wash.<WH7364> You shall put<WH5414> it between the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> and the altar,<WH4196> and you shall put<WH5414> water in it.<WH4325>
Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall wash<WH7364> their hands<WH3027> and their feet in it.<WH7272>

When they go<WH935> into the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> they shall wash<WH7364> with water,<WH4325> that they not die;<WH4191> or when they come near<WH5066> to the altar<WH4196> to minister,<WH8334> to burn an offering<WH6999> made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

So they shall wash<WH7364> their hands<WH3027> and their feet,<WH7272> that they not die:<WH4191> and it shall be a statute<WH2706> forever<WH5769> to them,<WH2233> even to him and to his descendants throughout their generations.<WH1755>"
Moreover Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Also take<WH3947> fine<WH7218> spices:<WH1314> of liquid<WH1865> myrrh,<WH4753> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> shekels;<WH1314> and of fragrant cinnamon<WH7076> half<WH4276> as much,<WH4276> even two hundred<WH3967> and fifty;<WH2572> and of fragrant<WH1314> cane,<WH7070> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty;<WH2572>
and of cassia<WH6916> five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary;<WH6944> and a hin<WH1969> of olive<WH2132> oil.<WH8081>

You shall make<WH6213> it a holy<WH6944> anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> a perfume<WH7545> compounded<WH4842> after the art<WH4639> of the perfumer:<WH7543> it shall be a holy<WH6944> anointing<WH4888> oil.<WH8081>
You shall use it to anoint<WH4886> the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> the ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715>
the table<WH7979> and all its articles,<WH3627> the lampstand<WH4501> and its accessories,<WH3627> the altar<WH4196> of incense,<WH7004>
the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering<WH5930> with all its utensils,<WH3627> and the basin<WH3595> with its base.<WH3653>
You shall sanctify<WH6942> them,<WH6944> that they may be most holy.<WH6944> Whatever touches<WH5060> them shall be holy.<WH6944>
You shall anoint<WH4886> Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> and sanctify<WH6942> them,<WH3547> that they may minister to me in the priest's office.
You shall speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> <WH6944> 'This shall be a holy anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081> to me throughout your generations.<WH1755>
It shall not be poured<WH3251> on man<WH120>'s flesh,<WH1320> neither shall you make<WH6213> any like it,<WH4971> according to its composition: it is holy.<WH6944> It shall be holy to you.<WH6944>
Whoever<WH834> compounds any like it,<WH834> or whoever puts<WH5414> any of it on a stranger,<WH2114> he shall be cut<WH3772> off from his people.<WH5971>'"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Take<WH3947> to yourself sweet spices,<WH5561> gum<WH5198> resin,<WH7827> and onycha, and galbanum;<WH2464> sweet<WH5561> spices<WH5561> with pure<WH2134> frankincense:<WH3828> there shall be an equal<WH905> weight of each;<WH905>
and you shall make<WH6213> incense<WH7004> of it,<WH7004> a perfume after the art<WH4639> of the perfumer,<WH7543> seasoned<WH4414> with salt,<WH2889> pure and holy:<WH6944>

and you shall beat<WH7833> some of it very small,<WH1854> and put<WH5414> some of it before<WH6440> the testimony<WH5715> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> where I will meet<WH3259> with you.<WH6944> It shall be to you most holy.<WH6944>
The incense<WH7004> which you shall make,<WH6213> according to its composition<WH4971> you shall not make<WH6213> for yourselves:<WH6944> it shall be to you holy for Yahweh.<WH3068>
Whoever<WH834> shall make<WH6213> any like that,<WH7306> to smell of it,<WH3772> he shall be cut off from his people.<WH5971>"
